Lassalette, P.C.400 Clement St Ste 102Basalt CO 81621-8499Attorney for ApplicantPublished: Ouray County Plaindealer: May 15, 22, 29, 2025––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––Legal Notice No. 48605Request for Qualifications & Request for ProposalsOuray CountyConstruction Management Services for the Corbett Creek Crossing Improvements ProjectOuray County is accepting sealed proposals for the Construction Management Services for the Corbett Creek Crossing Improvements Project. Proposal Package can be downloaded from Ouray County's website link: https://ouraycountyco.gov/259/Bids-and-Requests-for-Proposals-RFPs. For further information, please contact Ty Barger, Ouray County Road & Bridge Superintendent by email: tbarger@ourayco.gov, or 970-626-5391. All questions shall be in writing and emailed to Ty Barger.Statement of Qualifications (SOQ) shall be emailed (per instructions). The Proposed Rate Schedule including a flash drive with full proposal must be received in a sealed envelope and marked “Corbett Creek CM Proposed Rate Schedule” with the name of the company and mailed to Ouray County, Admin. Department, P.O. Box C, Ouray, CO 81427, or delivered by courier to: 541 4th St, Ouray, CO 81427 to be received no later than 4:00 p.m. MST, Thursday, June 12th, 2025 to the Administration department at the Ouray County Courthouse. Please review the terms within the RFQ / RFP package listed on the county website. Proposals received after the time/date due will not be considered. Ouray County reserves the right to reject any and all proposals, to waive any and all informalities, or to accept the proposal that best serves the interest of the County, and the right to disregard all nonconforming, non-responsive, or conditional proposals. Awarding of the proposal is not based solely upon low quotation price, but on overall service, quality, and “best value” to the County in accordance with the Ouray County Purchasing Manual.Published: Ouray County Plaindealer: May 22, 2025––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––
